description.value: Those who seek to control you quickly learn that a trickster has slippery schemes and cunning ruses to elude the most carefully crafted wording or mental command. If you start your turn with the &Reference[Charmed] condition, you can use your Reaction to ignore that condition until the end of your turn. Your divinity allows you to use this boon even if an effect is preventing you from using Reactions or controlling you to use your Reactions in a certain way. You can't use this boon to suppress a specific instance of the &Reference[Charmed] condition more than once.
